title: Segmentation fault when using incorrect trusted setup

labels.name: Epic Deneb
labels.description: Issues required to implement Deneb upgrade

body:

### Description
I want Teku not to crash with segmentation fault in any case and display a readable message on any issues.

### Steps to Reproduce (Bug)
When Teku expects mainnet trusted setup, provide one for minimal with `--Xtrusted-setup` and you'll get this

Could be closed when https://github.com/ethereum/c-kzg-4844/pull/148 comes to c-kzg release -> jc-kzg release -> dependency update in Teku
